metadata.description: Cross-platform offline-first mobile/desktop app for construction inspectors
metadata.session_notes: Session 433: Full project directory audit and cleanup. Recovered ~5GB (deleted vcpkg, 83K+ junk files). Fixed 106 analyze issues to 0. Reorganized test dirs for toolbox split. Updated CLAUDE.md, DEVELOPER_DOCS.md, toolbox-prd.md, patrol-testing.md. 8 app + 3 .claude commits pushed. All 2,343 tests passing.

current_phase.phase_name: Project audit complete; manual MCP harness pass and architecture.md update pending

active_blockers.title: Cross-fixture validation pending for hardened scorecard thresholds
active_blockers.notes: Scorecard hardening implementation is complete and extraction tests are green, but the tightened thresholds and new rows still need broader non-Springfield validation to confirm stable generic gates.
active_blockers.impact: Prevents final closure of scorecard-hardening quality phase.

active_blockers.title: Fixture generation skips without SPRINGFIELD_PDF dart-define
active_blockers.notes: Integration generator requires `--dart-define=SPRINGFIELD_PDF=...`; runs skip when missing.
active_blockers.impact: Prevents deterministic fixture refresh during strict verification loops.

resolved_blockers.title: Global flutter test suite has unrelated pre-existing failures
resolved_blockers.notes: Resolved during Session 426 test-fix loop. Sync provider harness and golden comparator pathing were corrected; full suite reached green.
resolved_blockers.impact: Resolved — no longer blocks full-repo green baseline.

resolved_blockers.title: Windows integration-test build toolchain failure for M&P test
resolved_blockers.notes: False positive. NuGet warning is cosmetic (red-colored but non-fatal). Build and test succeed.

resolved_blockers.title: SyncProvider test harness mismatch (null DatabaseService in mock construction)
resolved_blockers.notes: Resolved in Session 426 by updating sync-provider test doubles and DB setup to satisfy SyncService constructor contracts.
resolved_blockers.impact: Resolved — sync provider suite now passes.

brainstorm_backlog.title: Cell classification validation using consolidated headers
brainstorm_backlog.description: Now that headers are consolidated early (Stage 4A.1), we have complete column names and positions available before cell extraction. Brainstorm a validation method that uses the consolidated header structure to validate/correct cell classification — e.g., detecting misclassified boilerplate rows that have values in price/quantity column positions, or confirming data rows align with expected columns.
brainstorm_backlog.context: During header consolidation design (Option B selected for soft validation), user deferred validation to a future session. The 21 remaining boilerplate misclassifications (7 with valid price data) are a prime candidate for this validation.

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Deprecated APIs used for field mapping (Syncfusion migrating to new API surface)
dependencies_at_risk.action_needed: Audit before next upgrade, test IDR template field mapping

dependencies_at_risk.issue: Platform channel timeout issues on some devices (GitHub issues open)

team_context.work_style: Orchestration-based (user defines plans, Claude executes with agents)
